# Lingering Mirage
## Overview
**Lingering Mirage**

You can put the illusion magic you create to multiple uses.

**Benefit:** When you cast a (glamer) spell of 1st level or higher, as a swift action you may also gain the benefits of *[[Blur (Spell)|blur]]* for 1 round.

**Source:** Ultimate Options: New Arcane Discoveries (Super Genius Games), pg. 6
